snp3.10:1.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
snp3.10:1.3: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
snp3.10:1.4: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
snp3.10:1.5: “pāpicchā, bhante, sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti.
snp3.10:2.1: Evaṃ vutte, bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
snp3.10:3.2: tatiyampi kho kokāliko bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
snp3.10:3.3: “kiñcāpi me, bhante, bhagavā saddhāyiko paccayiko, atha kho pāpicchāva sāriputtamoggallānā, pāpikānaṃ icchānaṃ vasaṃ gatā”ti.
snp3.10:3.4: Tatiyampi kho bhagavā kokālikaṃ bhikkhuṃ etadavoca:
snp3.10:4.1: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
snp3.10:4.2: Acirappakkantassa ca kokālikassa bhikkhuno sāsapamattīhi piḷakāhi sabbo kāyo phuṭo ahosi;
snp3.10:4.12: Atha kho kokāliko bhikkhu tenevābādhena kālamakāsi.
snp3.10:4.13: Kālaṅkato ca kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṃ nirayaṃ upapajji sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā.
snp3.10:5.1: Atha kho brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
snp3.10:5.2: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho brahmā sahampati bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
snp3.10:5.4: kālaṅkato ca, bhante, kokāliko bhikkhu padumaṃ nirayaṃ upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā”ti.
snp3.10:5.6: idaṃ vatvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
snp3.10:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
snp3.10:6.2: “imaṃ, bhikkhave, rattiṃ brahmā sahampati abhikkantāya rattiyā …pe…
snp3.10:6.3: idamavoca, bhikkhave, brahmā sahampati, idaṃ vatvā maṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
snp3.10:7.1: Evaṃ vutte, aññataro bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
snp3.10:7.2: “kīvadīghaṃ nu kho, bhante, padume niraye āyuppamāṇan”ti?
snp3.10:7.4: taṃ na sukaraṃ saṅkhātuṃ ettakāni vassāni iti vā ettakāni vassasatāni iti vā ettakāni vassasahassāni iti vā ettakāni vassasatasahassāni iti vā”ti.
snp3.10:8.2: tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekaṃ tilaṃ uddhareyya.
snp3.10:8.3: Khippataraṃ kho so bhikkhu vīsatikhāriko kosalako tilavāho iminā upakkamena parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.4: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati abbudā nirayā evameko nirabbudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.5: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati nirabbudā nirayā evameko ababo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.6: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati ababā nirayā evameko aṭaṭo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.7: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati aṭaṭā nirayā evameko ahaho nirayo.
snp3.10:8.8: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati ahahā nirayā evameko kumudo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.9: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati kumudā nirayā evameko sogandhiko nirayo.
snp3.10:8.10: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati sogandhikā nirayā evameko uppalako nirayo.
snp3.10:8.11: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati uppalakā nirayā evameko puṇḍarīko nirayo.
snp3.10:8.12: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhu, vīsati puṇḍarīkā nirayā evameko padumo nirayo.
snp3.10:8.13: Padumaṃ kho pana bhikkhu nirayaṃ kokāliko bhikkhu upapanno sāriputtamoggallānesu cittaṃ āghātetvā”ti.
snp3.10:8.15: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato athāparaṃ etadavoca satthā:
